data.name: Nova CLI
data.desc: System CLI for Nova OS
data.ldesc: Access Nova System directly with Nova CLI, read and write files, execute functions and return data.

data.name: NovaOS Claw
data.desc: Rotur Claw NovaOS Client
data.ldesc: Read the Claw feed or become a part in the conversation. Now with attatchments.

data.name: Data manager
data.desc: Manage data in local storage
data.ldesc: Easily index and edit data in local storage.

data.name: OrionClient
data.desc: BETA OriginChats client
data.ldesc: A very clean NovaOS flavored client for rotur's originchats.

data.name: Credits center
data.desc: Rotur credits payment application
data.ldesc: Pay anyone with rotur credits. Personalized summary on wealth and easy transfers.

data.name: Rubix Timer
data.desc: Full Rubiks cube timer with scramble.
data.ldesc: Rubiks cube timer with smart interface and help. Also includes codes for scramble and presise timer to three magnitudes.

data.name: Textame
data.desc: Create Text and html files
data.ldesc: Create formatted HTML files without code. Text editor for rich text editing in NovaOS.

data.name: To Do App
data.desc: A standard To Do list which remembers your tasks!
data.ldesc: Create a To Do list of stuff you need to do - so that you won't forget. Updated by funsparktv.

data.name: Tic Tac Toe
data.desc: The game Of TicTacToe.
data.ldesc: Play the game of Tic Tac Toe with your friends with same screen multiplayer!

data.name: JS definer
data.desc: Paste any JS code to identify what is happening under the hood in a more simpler language.
data.ldesc: Define any JS code in a more simpler language.

data.name: Artion
data.desc: A sophisticated web application for drawing
data.ldesc: Create your artwork and download them with a click of a button!

data.name: Ducks Quack
data.desc: Pictures of ducks for all. To ensure global peace.
data.ldesc: An app that shows pictures of ducks with a panning animation.

data.name: Stable Diffusion
data.desc: Text to Image Generator based on Stable Diffusion.
data.ldesc: 'Stable Diffusion' is an innovative Text to Image Generator application that utilizes advanced stable diffusion techniques to seamlessly translate textual descriptions into visually compelling images.

data.name: Calier
data.desc: HTML code editor with preview
data.ldesc: HTML code editor with same screen preview and dynamic UI. Uses Ace editor.

data.name: OSL Editor
data.desc: Make apps with OriginOS's Origin Scripting language.
data.ldesc: Create with OriginOS's Origin Scripting language with file saving, open as window, open inline etc.

data.name: WCanvas2
data.desc: An full HTML, Python, OSL code editor.
data.ldesc: An HTML, OSL and python code editor with hotkeys, syntax highlighting, same screen previews, help and much more!

data.name: Lizabot3
data.desc: A personal Chatbot that don't hallucinate
data.ldesc: A modern UI for Lizabot3, a personal chatbot that browses the internet and leverage it to make results without the use of AI.

data.name: OriginOS Access
data.desc: The best GUI for OSL and OASM.
data.ldesc: Origin is the Web Desktop GUI for running OSL and OASM. It is the best Turbowarp OS. Version 4.9.9, hosted and made by Mistium.

data.name: NovaAI
data.desc: ChatBot interface for searching data.
data.ldesc: Nova AI, your intelligent virtual assistant, offers instant access to accurate information through its sleek interface and intuitive design. With advanced algorithms and integration with Wikipedia, Nova AI ensures reliable answers to a wide range of inquiries, making it your go-to companion for all your needs.

data.name: PySphere
data.desc: An Online Python Interpreter
data.ldesc: A python runner based on skulpt that lets you write and run Python code directly in your browser. It features syntax highlighting, code completion, and a user-friendly interface.

data.name: Nova Chess
data.desc: Play chess
data.ldesc: Nova Chess redefines chess gaming with a web-based platform designed to cater to both casual players and chess enthusiasts alike. It features live game evaluation! Ensuring a visually appealing and intuitive interface. Players interact directly with the board, clicking on pieces to execute moves seamlessly.

data.name: BlockHTML
data.desc: Blocks to HTML code
data.ldesc: Theres blocks with text that you can drag and drop to make source codes for webpages (HTML, CSS and JS). Now with more functions and advanced live previews.

data.name: Dot Engine
data.desc: Minimal beat editor tool with waveform editing.
data.ldesc: Digital oscillator editor tool with minimal beat maker UI.

data.name: Bad Things
data.desc: Interactive endless game where losing is fatal.
data.ldesc: A very hard game where forgetting 3 words causes your system to reset - but you can always quit.

data.name: JSON Editor
data.desc: Interactive and responsive editor for JSON files. Stable.

data.name: PDF Viewer
data.desc: View PDFs with ease.
data.ldesc: An app that let's you open PDFs in NovaOS using your browser's PDF environment.
